title: Going to DataStax Accelerate Bootcamp? This is What You'll Expect!
description:
Want to know how to build an application based on Apache Cassandra™? Don’t have a bunch of time to figure it out? Cristina and Eric give you a sneak preview of what you'll be working on. Join us for a one-day workshop and let’s build one together! 

Visit datastax.com/accelerate 
Use code: ACADEMYSOCIAL20 to get a discount and pay only $399.

transcript.text: [Music] we actually got to cover a bunch of different things you know what we're kind of some of the really hard-hitting topics you go from no experience learning about cassandra learning about DSC being able to spin up a cluster 2 all the way building in a YouTube like app which was no development of an app oh yeah yeah wow that's pretty incredible that actually probably helps you a lot when you're actually out there in the workforce it keeps you relevant right cuz you're you're actually hands-on you can say hey I use Cassandra I use this cool technology to do all these cool things yes Steve Halliday and Jamie Kane they've been teaching courses for over 10 years together these guys really know what they're doing and they're hilarious I cannot tell you how many clips that were hit handle during the course it was hilarious but yeah these guys have been teaching forever and whether you're someone that's completely new to Cassandra like me or if you're a senior and I've been doing this forever they can cater to your experience yeah they're awesome yeah so if you want to find out more head to data stats com ford slash accelerate [Music] now turn this up I saw somebody taking a picture this slide you don't think picture this slide spinning but almost demands on one slide for you
